snippet: Time is of the essence if Brazil is to host a successful Olympic Games in 2016, the International Olympic Committee President said on Tuesday....

headline.print_headline: Time of the Essence for Brazil, Says IOC Chief Bach
headline.main: Time of the Essence for Brazil, Says IOC Chief Bach

lead_paragraph: Time is of the essence if Brazil is to host a successful Olympic Games in 2016, the International Olympic Committee President said on Tuesday.
